name: Cursed Omens
description:
Description:

Quick and random game puzzle of 5/10 minutes in which the main character must survive 15 turns avoiding the traps of the mansion.

Controls:

Click on the adjacent tiles to move your character.

Information:

This is oursubmission for the Kenny Game Jam. This game was made in under 2 days around the theme of "cursed." We hope you like the concept and tell us what you think in the comments.

Fix Build:

Powerups cannot be obtain
